description: If executing without root privileges, [Fysbis](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0410) adds a `.desktop` configuration file to the user's `~/.config/autostart` directory.(Citation: Red Canary Netwire Linux 2022)(Citation: Fysbis Dr Web Analysis)

external_references.description: Doctor Web. (2014, November 21). Linux.BackDoor.Fysbis.1. Retrieved December 7, 2017.
TONY LAMBERT. (2022, June 7). Trapping the Netwire RAT on Linux. Retrieved September 28, 2023.
